text: Jahaniyan Jahangasht (مخدوم سید جہانیاں جہان گشت البخاری) (b 1308- d 1384) was a Sufi saint from the South Asia. His descendants are known as Bukhari and are a prominent lineage of Suhrawardi Saadat. Makhdoom was born on 19 January 1308 AD (14 Shaban 707 AH) in Uch near Bahawalpur, Pakistan. His father, Syed Ahmed Kabir, was the youngest son of Jalaluddin Surkh-Posh Bukhari.Marat-e-Jalali (مرآت جلالی) by Syed Khalil Ahmed Bukhari Hassami, First Edition 1918, Allahabad, Second Edition 1999, Karachi. ==See also== *Tomb of Bibi Jawindi * List of Sufis ==References== Category:Punjabi Sufi saints Category:1308 births Category:1384 deaths Category:Hashemite people Category:Shrines in Pakistan
title: Jahaniyan Jahangasht
